news.title: The Best Books I Read in 2018

news.content:
2018 was probably my best reading year ever (both in quantity and quality).

news.author: Detroit Free Press, Susan Tompor, Detroit Free Press
news.title: How the gender pay gap hurts women's retirement and 401(k) plans
news.description: Women come up short in retirement after years of working at lower wages than men, losing career opportunities due to caregiving, and other challenges.
news.content:
Looks the like gender pay gap is going to take a while to shrink, about 202 years to be exact. Veuer's Natasha Abellard has the story.
 Buzz60
Any woman who isn't investing money in a 401(k) plan  or maybe only sets aside a tiny amount needs to realize that… [+8415 chars]
